name: Climb the sandcastle
description:
An eldritch horror has just been created... It is ready to wreck havoc on this world! The only thing is... Some kid buried it under a sandcastle.

Avoid deadly traps and enemies, and climb the 100 floors of this sandcastle to reach the sunset and flay some minds!

This game was made for the 100th Weekly game jam! 100 floors would have been too hard to make, so there are "only" 34 of them, with variations!

Music by Melissotarsus
Main menu skybox is Classic Skybox
Sand texture by hhh316
